Class Unproject

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Helper class to determine screen to 3D world positions.

    v0.0.1
    Author:
    Dr. Andrew Marsh - http://andrewmarsh.com

      • gluUnProject

        public boolean gluUnProject(float winx,
                            float winy,
                            float winz,
                            processing.core.PVector result)
        Take a point on screen and project it on a plane (winz) paralle to the screen.
        Parameters:
        winx - The coordinates x of the point a on screen
        winy - The coordinates y of the point a on screen
        winz - The distance where the projected point should be put
        result - the PVector to put in the result
        Returns:
        If the given point is valid.

      • calculatePickPoints

        public boolean calculatePickPoints(processing.core.PApplet p,
                                   int x,
                                   int y)
        Take a point on screen and project it the near and far plane of the fustrum.
        Parameters:
        p - The parent PApplet
        x - The coordinates X of the point on screen.
        y - The coordinates Y of the point on screen.
        Returns:
        If the given point is valid.

      • intersect

        public processing.core.PVector intersect(float z)
        Calculate the intersection point between a plane parallel to the XY plane and the unprojected points.
        Parameters:
        z - The distance between XY plane and the plane to intersect to.
        Returns:
        The 3D intersection point
